data.name: Dark note
data.description:
note(note.com)のダークモードスタイル。
メインコンテンツ（記事ページなど）は対応したつもりですが、noteの全貌を把握していないので未対応箇所が相応にあります。

---

Dark mode for note(note.com).

data.name: Skyscraper City Non-Sticky Navbar
data.description:
Prevents navigation bar from being stuck to the top of browser window. That is, the navigation bar completely disappears when you scroll down the page. The attached screenshot presents that bar halfway hidden, it would disappear completely when scrolled a few more pixels down.

This add-on should be compatible with most other user styles.

data.name: Rikatillsammans Dark
Softer TEXTFILES
data.description: By default, T E X T F I L E S uses a harsh green on a flat black background with the default type face. This softens the green and the background to more closely match the way I remember my CRT monitor rendering these things in the past. The font is changed to Courier for that old school terminal feel.

data.name: 81Dojo Piece Contrast
data.description: Contrasts pieces of each player and highlights the last move square(s).

data.description: Provides a Dark Theme with Blue Text for the F@H Client Page.
